'''Uto''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The man greets you with arms crossed over his chest. He has a mass of scar tissue where his left eye would be, and his hands are knotted with bulging tendons.}}
Uto is one of the most talented weaponmakers in Neketaka and specializes in precise craftsmanship, turning metal and saltpeter into deadly tools first and works of Rauataian gunsmithing art second.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Firearms and explosives. Unique items include [Scordeo's Trophy](/scordeosTrophy/) and [Dragon's Dowry](/dragonsDowry/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
